bio1: I'm Harry Chang, and I explore the intersection of technology and storytelling. My work spans AI systems, photography, and content creation, driven by a passion for building tools and narratives that inspires.
bio2: As a 12th-grade student at Chingshin Academy, I'm motivated to boldly go where no one has gone before. I believe the most meaningful creations are those that solve real-world problems and open new doors for others, whether through code or a well-spoken story.
bio3: My journey is fueled by a constant curiosity, from early days with LEGO to current research regarding LLMs. If you have a complex problem or an interesting idea to share, please get in touch.

llmResearcher.title: LLM Researcher
llmResearcher.description: Researching LLM safety and lightweight defense mechanisms, with one paper published at TMLR and another under review at EACL, while interning at CyCraft.
